item.title: 在纽约布鲁克林区，一名乘客在一列火车驶来时失去知觉，从站台上跌落，思维敏捷的纽约警察跳入诺斯特兰大道站的地铁轨道，对其施以援手。
item.description:
Quick-thinking NYPD officers jumped into the Nostrand Avenue station subway tracks in Brooklyn, New York, to come to the aid of a straphanger who lost consciousness and fell from the platform as a train was coming. https://t.co/R07v5Qekbs pic.twitter.com/sgP50P7jmy

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 当局称，一名嫌疑人因涉嫌用 BB 枪劫持一辆洛杉矶地铁公交车而以绑架罪被捕。
item.description:
A suspect has been arrested on a kidnapping charge for allegedly hijacking a Los Angeles Metro bus with a BB gun, authorities say. https://t.co/EfnTPPFzcJ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: "幽灵军团 "士兵因在二战中鲜为人知的英雄事迹被授予国会金质奖章。
item.description:
"Ghost Army" soldiers awarded Congressional Gold Medal for little-known heroism in WWII. https://t.co/t7zcz1pXVi

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统周四宣布，他的政府将免除约 78,000 名公共服务人员 58 亿美元的联邦学生贷款债务。@SelinaWangTV 从华盛顿特区为您带来更多精彩内容#RightHereRightNow.
item.description:
Pres. Biden announced Thursday that about 78,000 public service workers will have $5.8 billion in federal student loan debt forgiven by his administration.@SelinaWangTV has more from Washington, D.C. #RightHereRightNow pic.twitter.com/IAnFKAPGxj

— ABC News Live (@ABCNewsLive) March 21, 2024

item.title: 法国体育部长表示，2023 年，300 多名法国教练、教师和体育官员被指控性虐待或掩盖此类不法行为。
item.description:
More than 300 French coaches, teachers and sports officials have been accused of sexual abuse or of covering up such wrongdoing in 2023, the country's sports minister said. https://t.co/ZlYKRpmodc

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 新泽西州参议员鲍勃-梅嫩德斯（Bob Menendez）表示，由于面临腐败和其他指控，他将不再寻求连任民主党参议员。尽管如此，他仍表示有可能在 11 月以独立候选人身份参选。
item.description:
BREAKING: New Jersey Sen. Bob Menendez says he will not seek another term as a Democrat as he faces corruption and other charges, which he denies. Still, he left the possibility of running in November open as an independent. https://t.co/ouaJq98YpQ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 几十年来，汽车已经变得越来越安全，但仍有许多工作要做，而女性碰撞假人的开发可能会确保美国妇女的更大安全。
item.description:
Cars have gotten safer over the decades, but more still needs to be done — and the development of female crash dummies may ensure greater safety of women in the U.S. https://t.co/pS75q1t1Io

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 警方消息来源告诉美国广播公司新闻（ABC News），两名寮屋居民因涉嫌谋杀而被通缉，因为他们涉嫌杀害了一名撞见他们住在其母亲纽约公寓的妇女。
item.description:
Two squatters are wanted for murder after they allegedly killed a woman who walked in on them living in her mother's New York City apartment, police sources told ABC News. https://t.co/HWEYpyfure pic.twitter.com/JDyqMAucK5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 据报道，加沙北部希法医院的加沙流离失所者周四被要求立即撤离，因为在与哈马斯的持续战争中，以色列对该医院的袭击已进入第四天。
item.description:
Displaced Gazans at Al-Shifa Hospital in northern Gaza were reportedly being told to evacuate immediately Thursday, as Israel's raid on the hospital continues into a fourth day amid the ongoing war with Hamas. https://t.co/QuGiokHqcO

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 一项新的分析显示，目前在美国买房要比租房贵得多，预计至少在未来五年内，房地产市场都将如此。
item.description:
Buying a house in the U.S. is considerably more expensive than renting right now, and the real estate market is expected to stay that way for at least the next five years, according to a new analysis. https://t.co/YcnfrbYuim

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 预计众议院将于周五就两党达成的政府拨款方案进行投票，国会将在最后期限前努力避免政府部分停摆。
item.description:
It's expected that the House will vote Friday on a bipartisan government funding package as Congress races to meet a deadline to avert a partial government shutdown. https://t.co/hGDj5Le6PG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据美国司法部称，六名前密西西比州执法人员因参与虐待两名黑人男子，在本周联邦法院的听证会上被判处数十年监禁。
item.description:
BREAKING: Six former Mississippi law enforcement officers were sentenced to decades in prison during hearings in federal court this week for their roles in the torture of two Black men, according to the Department of Justice. https://t.co/jnaUTlHDNC pic.twitter.com/o1xnnUdHxO

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 最新消息美国广播公司新闻证实，阿拉巴马州一名谎称自己被绑架的妇女卡莉-拉塞尔（Carlee Russell）在出庭时被勒令支付近 1.8 万美元的赔偿金，并被判缓刑。
item.description:
JUST IN: Carlee Russell, an Alabama woman who lied about her kidnapping, was ordered to pay nearly $18,000 in restitution and sentenced to probation during a court appearance, ABC News has confirmed. https://t.co/1A0DIPE4xm pic.twitter.com/9K64fw6ovu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 在南非皮拉尼斯堡国家公园，一头公象与一辆野生动物园卡车发生紧张对峙，受惊的游客纷纷躲到座位之间。
item.description:
Frightened tourists ducked between seats during a tense standoff between a bull elephant and a safari truck in South Africa's Pilanesberg National Park.

The safari guide who warded off the elephant was praised by wildlife experts. https://t.co/qlY553Kuxi pic.twitter.com/yx3KcV9gku

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 密苏里林肯大学校长约翰-莫斯利（John Moseley）在学生事务副校长安托瓦内特-坎迪亚-贝利（Antoinette "Bonnie" Candia-Bailey）自杀身亡后表示，在第三方调查发现 "没有欺凌指控 "后，该校校长复职。
item.description:
Lincoln University of Missouri's President John Moseley is reinstated after a third-party investigation found "no claims of bullying," after Antoinette "Bonnie" Candia-Bailey, the vice president of student affairs, died by suicide, the university said. https://t.co/L6E7OJCx8p pic.twitter.com/1T2ulddfAA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 警方称，11 岁的杰登-珀金斯（Jayden Perkins）在一起家庭暴力事件中为 "保护母亲 "而被刺身亡。
item.description:
Chicago officials and community members are grieving the loss of 11-year-old Jayden Perkins who police say was fatally stabbed while trying "to protect his mother" in a domestic violence incident. https://t.co/taElkR6WIx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 召回警报：美国消费品安全委员会宣布，2023 年星巴克假日礼品套装中销售的四种带金属涂层的陶瓷杯因容器过热或破裂而被召回。
item.description:
RECALL ALERT: Four types of ceramic mugs with metallic coating sold in 2023 Starbucks Holiday gift sets have been recalled due to reports of the vessel overheating or breaking, the CPSC announced. https://t.co/qrUbpGikjS

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 看吧：交通监控录像显示了一个热气球在明尼苏达州高速公路上撞上电线的瞬间。没有严重受伤的报道。
item.description:
SEE IT: Dramatic traffic cam footage shows the moment a hot air balloon sailed into power lines along a Minnesota highway.

Two of the passengers sustained minor injuries after the carriage disconnected. No serious injuries were reported. https://t.co/4EEYnDYK7V pic.twitter.com/xx62Pq7LJq

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 布林肯部长在埃及向记者发表讲话，此前美国提交了联合国决议草案，要求加沙 "立即停火并与释放人质挂钩"。
item.description:
Sec. Blinken addresses reporters in Egypt after U.S. submits draft UN resolution for "immediate cease-fire tied to the release of hostages" in Gaza.

Blinken says: "Children should not be dying of malnutrition in Gaza, or anywhere else for that matter." https://t.co/8jdPrgkKfm pic.twitter.com/HaosgPKkAm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 爆料：纽约州总检察长莱蒂西亚-詹姆斯（Letitia James）已经迈出了第一步，为可能扣押前总统特朗普在威彻斯特郡的资产奠定了基础，这也是特朗普民事欺诈案 4.64 亿美元判决的一部分。
item.description:
BREAKING: New York Attorney General Letitia James has taken an initial step toward laying the groundwork for a possible seizure of former Pres. Trump's assets in Westchester County as part of the $464 million judgment in Trump's civil fraud trial. https://t.co/oaVNKgTFWw

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 根据最新研究，全球气温上升可能对农业和全球通货膨胀造成的压力将可能导致食品价格进一步上涨。
item.description:
The strain that rising global temperatures could have on the agriculture industry and inflation around the world will likely cause food prices to increase even more, according to new research. https://t.co/Bt0sMkxJRc

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 负责监督前总统特朗普民事欺诈案审判的纽约法官对特朗普组织实施了监控，作为判决的一部分，该判决还要求特朗普支付近 5 亿美元的罚款。
item.description:
The New York judge who oversaw former Pres. Trump's civil fraud trial imposed a monitor over the Trump Organization as part of a judgment that also required Trump to pay a nearly-half billion dollar penalty. https://t.co/ViVs0cspua pic.twitter.com/BQBZ9HYzLm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024
